idea-plugin.name: Ayu Mirage Dark
idea-plugin.description:
Ayu Mirage Dark is a carefully refined dark theme inspired by the original Ayu Mirage palette, rebuilt and polished for long coding sessions and modern backend development.

What makes v2 different:
  • Fully rebalanced Ayu Mirage color palette
  • Improved contrast without increasing eye strain
  • Enhanced readability for Java, Kotlin, and Spring
  • Cleaner lambdas and anonymous class highlighting
  • Consistent UI and editor theming
Designed as a stable, daily-driver theme for professional developers.
